SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO, CATEGORY_NAME,QNA_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NO,QNA_WRITER,CREATE_DATE,q.STATUS FROM QUESTION q JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (QNA_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE q.STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,MEMBER_ID ,CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON(NOTICE_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y'
